plot: Through numerous personal interviews, professor Henry Louis Gates Jr. examines the past, present, and future of black/white race relations in the USA.
title: America Beyond the Color Line with Henry Louis Gates Jr.
plot_es: Through numerous personal interviews, professor Henry Louis Gates Jr. examines the past, present, and future of black/white race relations in the USA.
original_name: America Beyond the Color Line with Henry Louis Gates Jr.
plot_en: Through numerous personal interviews, professor Henry Louis Gates Jr. examines the past, present, and future of black/white race relations in the USA.
